scripts.logic-servers: wait-on tcp:27017 && wait-on tcp:6379 && concurrently --prefix "{name}" -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "magenta,yellow" "npm run server" "wait-on tcp:5000 && npm run client"
scripts.server: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --ignore client --exec 'prettier --write --config prettier.config.cjs --loglevel warn *.json server/index.js server/**/*.js && node --experimental-json-modules server/index.js' server client prettier.config.cjs
scripts.client: concurrently "nodemon --ignore client/node_modules --exec 'prettier --write --config prettier.config.cjs --loglevel warn *.json client/src/**/*.js' *.cjs *.json" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.mongo: mongo localhost:27017 # Go into interactive CLI with 'npm run mongo'
scripts.redis: redis-cli # Go into interactive CLI with 'npm run redis'
scripts.build: mkdir server/build; rollup server/index.js -c server/config.rollup.js | terser --compress --mangle -o server/build/index.js
scripts.parallel-install: concurrently --success all --prefix "{time}-{pid} {name}" -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "magenta,yellow" "npm install --only prod" "npm install --prefix client --only prod"
scripts.parallel-build: concurrently --success all --prefix "{time}-{pid} {name}" -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "magenta,yellow" "npm run build" "npm run build --prefix client"
